titleStmt.title: Uniformity in humane doctrinall ceremonies ungrounded on 1 Cor. 14.40. or, a reply unto Dr. Hammonds vindication of his grounds of uniformity from the 1 Cor. 14.40. By Henry Jeanes, minister of Gods word at Chedzoy
titleStmt.author: Jeanes, Henry, 1611-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A. Lichfield printer to the Universitie, for Tho. Robinson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
